section.title: Overview
section.para: Pardus &PRODVER; contains major improvements over the previous Pardus release &PREVVER;. The following sections provide a brief overview of those changes.

listitem.para: Kernel - &KERNELVER; Linux kernel provides updated hardware support together with a hundred of bug fixes.
YALI - YALI, the installer of Pardus, gained Rescue Mode which provides easy password and bootloader recovery.

KDE SC - Pardus &PRODVER; comes with the latest KDE Software Compilation, KDE SC &KDEVER;. The base packages also contains numerous backports and fixes which will improve the stability of your desktop experience significantly.

LibreOffice - LibreOffice, an Open Source personal productivity suite sponsored by the Document Foundation, is updated to the much-awaited &LIBREOFFICEVER; version which brings huge improvements over the older version.
Firefox - Firefox &FIREFOXVER;, the latest stable version of the most popular Open Source web browser, is now shipped with Pardus &PRODVER;.
